de.kaktushose.discord.reactionwaiter

Class ReactionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • de.kaktushose.discord.reactionwaiter.ReactionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener

    public class ReactionListener
extends net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
    This class is a sub class of ListenerAdapter from JDA. It checks all incoming GuildMessageReactionAddEvents if they matches one of the active ReactionWaiters
    Make sure to activate the listener before using this library. Otherwise no GuildMessageReactionAddEvent will be tracked.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Kaktushose

    • Method Detail

      • startListening

        public static void startListening(@Nonnull
                                  net.dv8tion.jda.api.JDA jda)
        Adds this listener to the active listeners of the JDA. You have to call this method before using the library.
        Parameters:
        jda - he JDA with which the listener will be registered

      • stopListening

        public static void stopListening(@Nonnull
                                 net.dv8tion.jda.api.JDA jda)
        Removes this listener from the active listeners of the JDA. This method has no real use case, but is available for the sake of completeness.
        Parameters:
        jda - the JDA where the listener will be removed

      • setAutoRemove

        public static void setAutoRemove(boolean autoRemove)
        Set this to true to automatically remove waiters after a given set of time. Default this will happen after five minutes and will also clear all reactions.
        Parameters:
        autoRemove - true if waiters should be removed automatically

      • setAutoRemoveDelay

        public static void setAutoRemoveDelay(long delay,
                                      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Set the time interval after which waiters will be removed automatically. The default value is five minutes.
        Parameters:
        delay - the time from now to deactivate the waiter
        timeUnit - the time unit of the delay parameter

      • setRemoveReactions

        public void setRemoveReactions(boolean removeReactions)
        Set this to true if all reactions of a message should be removed when the waiter gets unregistered.
        Parameters:
        removeReactions - true if all reactions of a message should be removed

                                      @NotNull net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.message.guild.react.GuildMessageReactionAddEvent event)
